title: Times Square
description: Times Square is the epicenter of entertainment and commercialism, known for its bright, flashing billboards and the famous New Year's Eve Ball Drop. It's a vibrant and bustling hub for theater, shopping, and dining, making it an iconic symbol of New York City.
